Plot a tSNE colored by feature.

Source: R/plot.R
plot_tsne.Rd

Plot a tSNE colored by feature.

plot_tsne(data, x = "tSNE_1", y = "tSNE_2", feature,
  legend_name = "", c_cols = pretty_palette2, d_cols = NULL,
  pt_size = 0.25, scale_limits = NULL, do_label = FALSE,
  do_legend = TRUE)

Arguments

data

input data
x

x variable
y

y variable
feature

feature to color by
legend_name

legend name to display, defaults to no name
c_cols

character vector of colors to built color gradient for continuous values. defaults to clustifyR::pretty_palette
d_cols

character vector of colors for discrete values. defaults to RColorBrewer paired palette
pt_size

point size
scale_limits

defaults to min = 0, max = max(data$x), otherwise a two-element numeric vector indicating min and max to plot
do_label

whether to label each cluster at median center
do_legend

whether to draw legend

Contents

  • Arguments
